article_title: Bishop: In pursuit of truth beyond the comfort zone

og.description: In the 1980s, when I became a reporter at what was then The Roanoke Times & World-News, I would read Ben Beagle's columns, in which he made gentle fun of his life in the Roanoke County suburbs.
